Why build this repository?

I can see her whenever Iâ€™m writing code, even though she doesnâ€™t like me anymore. (æˆ‘æ˜¯è€æ·»ç‹— in Chinese Speaking)

The coding that makes me happier.

MyCuteGirl

MyCuteGirl ! Sheâ€™s 14 years old in China.

My story

I was diagnosed with depression in my second year of junior high school.

After that, I wasnâ€™t interested in anything..

And than,Iâ€™ve been thinking all day about how to kill myself.

My parents took me to a mental hospital to see a doctor, the doctor gave me a lot of medicine.

I began to become lazy and numb.

But it wasnâ€™t until I met herâ€¦..

Sheâ€™s cute, and I love to pinch her face, and sheâ€™s happy to do it

She made me feel a little happy.

But it wonâ€™t cure my depression either.

She was disappointed in me.
